name: The Fallen Adobe
description: 'The fallen Adobe' tells the story of a fallen brick from an enchanted castle. Many millenia ago a tyrant desiring to build an everlasting magic castle orders his mages to infuse the souls of his enemies into the adobe bricks to build the castle....Many many years later a brick falls from one of its walls and tries to gain freedom. Enjoy this puzzle platformer. Please note that this game is still in its prototype stages ...kindly forgive some minor bugs if any ...
